title: Hotel folio/bill and final receipts
dataVerified: Guest name, hotel, itemized charges, room rate, taxes, total, payment method
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered hotel bills (inflated expense claims). Domain binding verifies hotel. Expense claim verification. Tax deduction documentation (business travel). Prevents charge dispute fraud. Multi-page: Hotel folios often multi-page with itemized charges.
